control.ai
Class SearchSpace

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      control.ai.SearchSpace
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class SearchSpace
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer

This class maintains the search space (i.e. possible solution combinations). It observes all instances of PlayerAssumptions to exclude solutions with cards on other player's hands.

See Also:
PlayerAssumption, AIPlayer

public void excludeCard(Card card)
Exclude all possible solutions with a certain hand card.

Parameters:
card - the card which is not in the solution envelope

getPossibleCards

public java.util.Set<Card> getPossibleCards()
Get all possible cards (not separated by their kind).

Returns:
set of cards which could be in the envelope

setSolution

public void setSolution(Suggestion sol)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
Set the solution combination directly. This is used when low level AI agents are lucky enough to suggest the correct combination and nobody can disprove the suggestion. Note that after calling this function, the stored solution and the set of remaining possible cards may not be consistent.

Parameters:
sol - a suggestion containing the solution
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the parameter is null

getSolutionPerson

public Card getSolutionPerson()
Get the person in the envelope. Returns null if this is not fully determined yet.

the person in the envelope or null
